imdb.plot outline: This Plot was Based on original title of a novel written by the Scottish author Robert Louis Stevenson .The work is commonly known today as The Strange Case of Dr Jekyll and Mr Hyde,It is about a lawyer who investigates strange occurrences between his old friend, Dr Dabare and the evil man.The work is commonly associated with the rare mental condition often spuriously called "split personality", referred to in psychiatry as associative identity disorder,where within the same body there exists more than one distinct personality.In this case, there are two personalities within Dr Jekyll, one apparently good and the other evil,completely opposite levels of morality.
imdb.title: Pinsara Dosthara Teledrama
plot: This Plot was Based on original title of a novel written by the Scottish author Robert Louis Stevenson .The work is commonly known today as The Strange Case of Dr Jekyll and Mr Hyde,It is about a lawyer who investigates strange occurrences between his old friend, Dr Dabare and the evil man.The work is commonly associated with the rare mental condition often spuriously called "split personality", referred to in psychiatry as associative identity disorder,where within the same body there exists more than one distinct personality.In this case, there are two personalities within Dr Jekyll, one apparently good and the other evil,completely opposite levels of morality.::Surani Liyanage
